deposit.info: Detailed information about deposit and cash out you can find
deposit.verify: Based on the gaming license requirements in your country of residence, your account needs to be verified before you can deposit. This generally takes a few hours only.You can proceed to upload the documents needed on
deposit.working: Η ομάδα μας το αντιμετωπίζει αυτή τη στιγμή.
deposit.excluded: You are unable to deposit due to self exclusion
deposit.happened: Κάτι κακό συνέβη. Λυπούμαστε πραγματικά για αυτό το θέμα.
deposit.optional: (Max one per user can be active at a time)
deposit.no_bonuses: No available bonus. If you have a bonus-code, enter it above
deposit.no_methods: Δεν βρέθηκαν μέθοδοι πληρωμής, δοκιμάστε αργότερα.
deposit.bonus_offers: This new and exclusive bonus offer is available to use only once. You will receive a {percentage}% deposit bonus (up to maximum of €{maximum}).
deposit.helperAmount: Μπορείτε να εισαγάγετε το ποσό από {min} έως {max}
deposit.change_limits: To be able to deposit you need to change your deposit limits and this will come in to effect after the exclusion period you set is over
deposit.bonusInfo.gain: {bonusAmount} στον λογαριασμό μπόνους σας ({bonusPercent}% του ποσού που έχει κατατεθεί, αλλά όχι πάνω από {bonusLimit})
deposit.bonusInfo.title: Αυτό το Μπόνους σάς δίνει:
deposit.deposit_new_card: You can also deposit using a new card
deposit.bonusInfo.release: Το Μπόνους απελευθερώνεται με την επιστροφή {payoutPercent}% της γκανιότας που πληρώθηκε για κάθε τουρνουά στο οποίο συμμετέχετε
deposit.already_have_bonus: You already have an active bonus {bonusName}. If you deposit with a new bonus, your previous one will be lost.
deposit.no_deposit_methods: We are sorry, but currently, there are no valid deposit solutions available from your country. If you have any questions about this, please contact support@fanteam.com
deposit.user.deposit_limit: You can not deposit due to current limits set up to your account. Please check the Account limits section to see your current applicable limits.
deposit.user.exceeds_limit: You can not deposit due to current limits set up to your account. Please check the Account limits section to see your current applicable limits.
deposit.account.pep_checked: Deposits it not allowed. Contact support team for further information.
deposit.bonus_offers_ticket: This new and exclusive bonus offer is available to use only once. You can receive a ticket with buy-in {ticketCost} after fulfilling the requirements.
deposit.user.freeze_deposit: You can not deposit due to your account being currently restricted. If you wish to re-activate your account, please contact customer service via live chat or email. Our customer service team will be very happy to help you.
deposit.account.kyc_required: You need to verify your account. All UK users needs to verify their age and address before being able to deposit to FanTeam.com. Please click the "not verified yet" link in your profile, and follow the instructions there. Verification usually only takes a few hours if documents submitted are correct.
deposit.account.pep_required: Security check is failed for the user. If this is not correct, please contact support

deposit.bonus_offers_sportsbook: This new and exclusive bonus offer is available to use only once. You will receive a {percentage}% deposit bonus (up to maximum of €/£{maximum}).
deposit.account.gamstop_exclusion: Deposit process stopped by GamStop. If this is not correct, please contact support.
deposit.account.identity_required: Identity check is failed for the user. If this is not correct, please contact support
